android.androidVNC

类 VncCanvasActivity.TouchPanTrackballMouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.androidVNC.VncCanvasActivity.TouchPanTrackballMouse
  • 封闭类:
    VncCanvasActivity

    public class VncCanvasActivity.TouchPanTrackballMouse
extends java.lang.Object
    The touchscreen pans the screen; the trackball moves and clicks the mouse.
    作者:
    Michael A. MacDonald
